thread.title: Nerve agent used in attempted murder of ex-Russian spy: UK police

title: Nerve agent used in attempted murder of ex-Russian spy: UK police
text:
Nerve agent used in attempted murder of ex-Russian spy: UK police 3:28pm EST - 00:38 
British police are treating an incident in which a Russian ex-spy and his daughter fell critically ill as attempted murder by administration of a nerve agent, the head of counter terrorism policing said on Wednesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British police are treating an incident in which a Russian ex-spy and his daughter fell critically ill as attempted murder by administration of a nerve agent, the head of counter terrorism policing said on Wednesday.
